DellSlot.description: DellSlot provides slot occupancy and device correlation information.
DellSlot.longDescription: DellSlot provides slot occupancy and device correlation information.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ConnectorLayout.description: Describes the type of packaging normally associated with this type of connector. 16 (PCI) - Describes the generic PCI connector layout. 17 (PCI-X) - Describes the PCI Extended connector layout. 18 (PCI-E) - Describes the PCI Express connector layout, where the actual layout, as far as the length is concerned, is unknown. 19 - 25 (PCI-E xN) - Describes the PCI Express connector layout, where N is the lane count that appropriately describes the length of the PCI-E connector.
ConnectorLayout.longDescription: Describes the type of packaging normally associated with this type of connector. 16 (PCI) - Describes the generic PCI connector layout. 17 (PCI-X) - Describes the PCI Extended connector layout. 18 (PCI-E) - Describes the PCI Express connector layout, where the actual layout, as far as the length is concerned, is unknown. 19 - 25 (PCI-E xN) - Describes the PCI Express connector layout, where N is the lane count that appropriately describes the length of the PCI-E connector.

DeviceFQDD.description: The property represents the FQDD for the device that is plugged into the slot.
DeviceFQDD.longDescription: The property represents the FQDD for the device that is plugged into the slot.

EmptySlot.description: The property represents whether the slot is empty. TRUE - Empty. FALSE - Occupied.
EmptySlot.longDescription: The property represents whether the slot is empty. TRUE - Empty. FALSE - Occupied.

Number.description: The property represents the numeric slot number. If the slot number contains alphabets, this property is NULL and the slot number is obtained from property NumberDescription.
Number.longDescription: The property represents the numeric slot number. If the slot number contains alphabets, this property is NULL and the slot number is obtained from property NumberDescription.

NumberDescription.description: The property represents the slot number containing alphanumeric value.
NumberDescription.longDescription: The property represents the slot number containing alphanumeric value.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

SlotEnabledState.description: The property represents whether the slot is enabled or disabled.
SlotEnabledState.longDescription: The property represents whether the slot is enabled or disabled.

Tag.description: This property is the key and has a unique value.
Tag.longDescription: This property is the key and has a unique value.

title: #DellSlot.v1_0_0.DellSlot
